customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Review was suppressed so editing this so it’s “not” The ball stop internally opened very little. We blended the watermelon with the mixed alcohols and strained it. customer_reviews.title: Give It A Try - Fun, Easy, and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that this might be flimsy or too hard to install - but I was wrong! The installation was a breeze. After hollowing out a pumpkin, we chose a spot low enough keep punch coming out, but not so low that we couldn't use it. The accompanying tool cuts the perfect sized hole. Assembly was easy (good pics in the instructions) and we were off and running. The tap inself didn't leak, worked well all afternoon. Very sturdy feeling. Super fun at our tailgate. Looking forward to watermelon season!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Love this tap
customer_reviews.text: Love this tap! It was easy to install inside the watermelon with the included tool. It looks super cute and works well. Cleaning was quick and easy after use. I am looking forward to using this many times this summer.
customer_reviews.author: JessB

customer_reviews.title: But it was still fun, and next time I will just put the ...
customer_reviews.text: Used with a pumpkin at Thanksgiving! We filled it with pumpkin beer and it was a total hit. Definitely make sure to put the hole low enough, or when the liquid level gets too low it won't pour. I put it too high up and there was still a ton of beer in the bottom of it that we had to tip it over to pour it out. But it was still fun, and next time I will just put the tap lower and it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ali
